author: Meera Srinivasan
title: ‘Stay at home for the country’
description: India sends emergency medical supplies to Sri Lanka
content:
For people who have braved a war for 30 years, living in camps and amid fear, staying at home in the wake of pandemic cannot be difficult, Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa said, urging citizens to stay at home for the countrys sake.
